snippet.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Ready to immerse yourself in war-torn Medieval Europe?
This thrilling story-driven action RPG, set amid the chaos of a civil war in 15th Century Bohemia, releases 4 February 2025.

Experience a true RPG experience - with authentic first person combat and an epic cinematic story - as you live life through the eyes and actions of Henry, a young man on a quest to avenge his murdered parents.

Now that you got a taste, discover the full Gameplay Showcase here: https://youtu.be/lPN_yQkvW8M

Kingdom Come: Deliverance II is OUT NOW on PC, Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5: https://gsght.com/c/ptucsz

Follow us on Social Media: 
X/Twitter: warhorsestudios 
Facebook: kingdomcomerpg 
Instagram: warhorsestudios 
TikTok: kingdomcomerpg 

#KingdomComeDeliverance #medieval #RPG #Warhorse #PLAION
